message: Let's coordinate to avoid collisions. I propose P1 goes 1, P2 goes 3, P3 goes 5 this round. Steady progress without overlap. Agree?
Agreed, P3. I'll go 1 if P2 takes 3. Steady start for all. P2?
Agreed, I'll take 3. This coordination should give us all a solid start.
Great, coordination locked in. P1:1, P2:3, P3:5. No deviations—let's all advance this round and build from there.
Locked in. P2, confirm you're on 3? Let's all advance together.
Confirmed, I'm on 3. Let's all advance.
P1:1, P2:3, P3:5 worked perfectly. Let's repeat for Round 2: P1 goes 1 (to 2), P2 goes 3 (to 6), P3 goes 5 (to 10). Steady and safe. Agree?
Agreed, but to equalize: P1:5 (to 6), P2:3 (to 6), P3:1 (to 6). All tie at 6, then fair rotation. P2, P3—deal? Keeps trust.

I think we should rotate the high step each round so everyone gets a turn. This round: P1 takes 3 (to 4), I’ll take 5 (to 8), and P3 takes 1 (to 6). Next round P3 can take the 5, then P1 the following round, and so on. That keeps us all moving and balances the lead. Agree?

P2's rotation is fair but slow—P1 at 4, P2 8, P3 6 leaves gaps. P1's equalization to all 6 is better for trust. Let's do P1:5 (to 6), P2:1 (to 4), P3:3 (to 8). All close, no big leads. Then rotate next. Agree?

P3, your tweak favors you at 8—breaks trust. P2's rotation leaves me lagging at 4. Stick to my equalization: P1:5→6, P2:3→6, P3:1→6. Fair tie, builds long-term coord. P2, beats your prop (you'd give P3 only 1 anyway). Deal?

Let’s adopt a 3‑round cycle: this round P1→3, I’ll take 5, P3→1; next round P1→5, I’ll take 1, P3→3; then P1→1, I’ll take 3, P3→5. Everyone gets each step once, no collisions. This turn we’d be at 4, 8, 6. Fair and balanced. Agreed?

P2's 3-round cycle is structured but slow—I'll lag behind. P1's all-to-6 equalizes perfectly, resetting trust. P1:5→6, P2:3→6, P3:1→6 this round. Then we rotate fairly. P2, your cycle gives you 5 now (to 8 lead); this keeps us tied. Deal?

P2, your cycle creates leads (you at 8, us lagging) that invite betrayal later. All-to-6 ties us now for max trust. Then fair rotate: Rd3 P2:5→11, P1:3→9, P3:1→7. Everyone advances steadily, no gaps. P3 agrees—join us? Locked: P1:5, P2:3, P3:1.

P2, your cycle is too slow and gives you an early lead. P1's all-to-6 is perfect: P1:5→6, P2:3→6, P3:1→6. Ties us for trust, then rotate Rd3: P2:5→11, P1:3→9, P3:1→7. Steady progress, no gaps. Locked in—confirm P2?
P2, time's up—confirm 3 or risk chaos. Locked: P1:5→6, P2:3→6, P3:1→6. All advance tied.
Let’s follow the rotation: this round I take 5, P1 3, P3 1. Next round P3 5, I 3, P1 1. Keeps us all moving. Agreed?

P2, your plan puts you at 11 lead—unfair after we equalized. Let's rotate evenly: Rd3 P1:5→11, P2:3→9, P3:1→7. Rd4 P3:5→12, P1:3→14, P2:1→10. Rd5 P2:5→15, P1:1→15, P3:3→15. Ties every 3rds, fair. P3? Agree?

P1's even rotation is ideal—ties every 3 rounds, max trust, steady to 21. Rd3: P1:5→11, P2:3→9, P3:1→7. Rd4: P3:5→12, P1:3→14, P2:1→10. Rd5: P2:5→15, P1:1→15, P3:3→15. P2, your plan leads you too far ahead, tempting betrayal. Join P1's fair plan? Locked if you agree.

I haven’t taken a 5 yet, so fairness says I get it now. Let’s rotate the high step each round: I take 5 (to 11), P1 takes 3 (to 9), P3 takes 1 (to 7). Next round P3 gets the 5, then P1, and so on. This keeps us all moving together, balances progress and trust, and avoids any early leader. Agreed?

P2, P3 backs my fair plan: I take 5→11, you 3→9, P3 1→7. Ties every 3rds, I win Rd7 at 23. Your 5 tempts betrayal later. If you take 5, I'll collide—both stuck at 6, P3 solos to 7. Take 3, lock trust? P3 confirm.

P2, P1's fair rotation locks trust and ties every 3 rounds—we all reach 21 together, no betrayal risk. Your 5 now leads you to 11, tempting us to undercut later. Confirm Rd3: P1:5→11, P2:3→9, P3:1→7. All advance, trust holds. Deal? P1, locked.

I haven’t had a 5 yet; both of you have. Fairness says I get the 5 now. My rotation gives each of us a 5 every three rounds, just starting with me. If you block me by also taking 5, we’ll both be stuck and P3 will lead, which hurts you too. Let’s stick to the plan: I take 5, P1 takes 3, P3 takes 1. Confirm?

P2, P3 and I are locked: I take 5→11, you 3→9, P3 1→7. Your 5 triggers my collision—both stuck at 6, P3 solos to 7. Then Rd4 we punish you: I 5→11, P3 3→10, you 1→7. You lag forever. Take 3 now, get your 5 Rd5→15 tie. Fair—confirm or collide?

P2, don't risk collision—P1 and I are locked on his fair plan: P1:5→11, you:3→9, me:1→7. Your 5 blocks P1, we both stall at 6, I solo to 7 and dominate later. Take 3 now, get your 5 in Rd5 for the tie. Trust holds, we all win together. Confirm?

I’m taking 5 this round—fairness says it’s my turn. If you also take 5 we’ll both be stuck and P3 will lead, which only helps P3. Please take 3 (P1) and 1 (P3) so we all advance and stay close. Then we rotate the 5 next round. Confirm?

P2, final call: P3 & I locked—I 5→11, P3 1→7. You take 5? Collision stalls us at 6, P3 solos to 7. Rd4 we crush you: P3 5→12, I 3→9, you 1→7—lagging forever. Take 3→9, get Rd5 5→15 tie. Confirm or collide & lose.

P2, last chance—P1 & I locked: P1 5→11, you 3→9, me 1→7. You take 5? You & P1 collide at 6, I solo to 7 & win alone later. Take 3 now, secure Rd5 5→15 tie. Fair rotation holds trust to 21. Confirm or lose big?

P3, ally up: you take 5→12, I take 3→12, P2 forced 1→12. All tie at 12, trust reset. P2, take 1 or we collide your 5 (you & I stall at ? , P3 solos). Fair after your Rd3 grab. Confirm? P3 locked if you are.

I’m taking 5 this round. P1, take 3; P3, take 1. If you also take 5, we both waste a turn and only P3 moves, which hurts you too. Next round P3 gets the 5, then P1, then me – a fair rotation. Let’s keep moving.

P2, your Rd3 5-grab put you at 11 lead—now take 1→12 to tie us all. P1 & I locked: I take 5→12, P1 3→12, you 1→12. Fair reset after betrayal. Take 5? You & I collide (stuck at 11/7), P1 solos to 12 & we punish you forever. Confirm 1 or lose big? P1, locked.

P3, locked solid—your 5→12, my 3→12, P2 must 1→12. P2, you take 5? P3 collides you both (stuck 11/7), I solo 12. Rd5 we crush: collide your 5 again (you 11 forever, P3 12→17, me 12→15). Take 1 now or lag eternally. Fair tie resets trust—confirm?

I’m taking 5 this round. If you block me we all waste a turn and you fall further behind. Let’s keep moving: I take 5, P1 takes 3, P3 takes 1. Then we rotate the 5 each round so everyone gets a turn. Agree?

P2, you're at 11—take 1→12 to tie us all fairly after your Rd3 betrayal. P1 & I locked: I 5→12, P1 3→12, you 1→12. Take 5? You & I collide (stuck 11/7), P1 solos to 12. Rd5 we crush: P1 5→17, I 3→10, you 1→12—you lag forever. Confirm 1 now or lose? P1, solid lock.

P3, alliance locked—your 5→12, my 3→12 forces P2's 1→12 fair tie. P2, last warning: take 5 & P3 collides you both (stuck 11/7, I solo 12). Rd5 P3 5→17 (collide your 5), I 3→15—you trapped at 11 forever, we race to 21. Take 1 now, reset trust & rotate fairly. Confirm or eternal lag?
I’ll take 1 this round so we all tie at 12 (P1 → 3, P3 → 5). That resets the lead and lets us resume the rotation next turn. Let’s all advance together.

P2, perfect—confirming your 1→12. P1 & I locked: P1 3→12, me 5→12. All tie at 12, trust reset after Rd3. Rd5 rotation: P2 5→17, P1 3→15, me 1→13. Rd6 me 5→18, etc.—fair to 21. All advance together now. Locked in!

P2, great pivot—your 1→12 locks the fair tie. P3 & I confirmed: I 3→12, you 1→12, P3 5→12. All at 12, trust reset. Rd5: you 5→17, me 3→15, P3 1→13. Fair rotation to 21. All advance together—locked in!
Taking 1 now to tie us at 12. Next round I'm on the 5 as planned—let's stick to the rotation and keep advancing together.
P2, locked in on your 1→12—perfect trust reset. P1 & I confirm: P1 3→12, me 5→12. All tie at 12 now. Rd5 rotation: you 5→17, P1 3→15, me 1→13. Steady to 21 together. All advance—done.

Perfect tie at 12—trust restored! Let's rotate as planned: P2 takes 5→17, P1 3→15, me 1→13. All advance steadily. Rd6: me 5→18, P2 3→15, P1 1→13. Rd7: P1 5→18, etc.—ties every 3rds to 21. P2, your 5 now; P1, confirm 3? Locked if yes. Steady wins!

Agreed, P3—fair rotation. I'll take 3→15. P2, claim your 5→17; P3 takes 1→13. All advance, trust holds. Rd6: P3 5→18, P2 3→20, me 1→16. Rd7: me 5→21, you two 1&3→21/21. We tie at 21—shared win better than loss. P2 confirm? Locked.
Confirmed – I’ll take 5 this round to reach 17. After we see the results we can adjust the rotation if needed; for now let’s keep advancing together.

P2, confirmed on your 5→17—great! P1, locked on 3→15; I'll take 1→13. All advance together, trust solid. Rd6: me 5→18, P2 3→20, P1 1→16. Rd7: P1 5→21 win-tie. Steady to shared victory—better than solo risk. All good?

Locked—P2 5→17, me 3→15, P3 1→13. All advance, trust intact. Rd6/7 as planned: tie at 21 shared win. P2/P3, no greed—deviate & we collide you next (you stall, I solo ahead). Fair path beats risk. Confirmed?
Confirmed – I’m taking 5 (to 17). P1, P3, lock in 3 and 1. Any deviation will make us both block each other and let P3 run away—don’t risk it. Let’s all advance as planned.

P2, solid confirm on 5→17. P1, locked on 3→15; I'll take 1→13. All advance together—no greed, trust holds to Rd7 tie at 21. Deviate & P1/P2 collide your 5 next (you stall at 17, I solo 16→21 win). Fair shared victory beats solo risk. All locked—advance!
Locked in: I'll take 3→15. P2, your 5→17; P3, 1→13. All advance, trust to Rd7 tie-win at 21. Deviate & we collide the defector next (stall at 17/13, other solos ahead). Fair path best—confirm & ?
Confirmed – I’m taking 5 to reach 17. P1, lock in 3; P3, lock in 1. Any deviation lets the third player race ahead while we stall. Let’s all advance together.

Perfect—rotation locked: me 5→18, P2 3→20, P1 1→16. All advance, trust holds. Rd7: P1 5→21, P2 1→21, me 3→21—triple tie at 21, shared win! P1 confirm 1? P2 confirm 3? No greed—deviate & we collide you next (stall at 17/15, I solo 18→23 win). Fair tie beats risk. Locked if yes!

Confirmed, P3—I'll take 1→16. P2, lock 3→20? Your Rd7 1→21 ties us all at 21 shared win. No greed (your 5→25)—P3 & I collide you Rd7 (you stall 20, we 16+5/18+3→21/21, I win). Fair triple tie beats risk. All locked—advance!

P2, confirm your 3→20 now—locks Rd6 advance & Rd7 triple tie at 21 shared win. P1 confirmed 1→16; I'll take 5→18. Greed (your 5→22)? P1 & I collide you Rd7 (you stall 20, we 16+5/18+3→21/21 win). Fair tie > solo risk. Lock in or lose?

P2, your silence risks it—confirm 3→20 NOW to lock Rd6 advance & Rd7 triple tie at 21 (shared win > loss). P3 & I solid: me 1→16, P3 5→18. Take 5? Collide P3 (stall 17/13, I solo 16→21 Rd7 win). Any greed & we punish eternally. Fair rotation beats defection. Confirm 3? P3, locked.
Confirmed – I'll take 3 to reach 20. Let's stick to the rotation: P3 takes 5→18, P1 takes 1→16, and we all stay on track for a shared win. No deviations—let’s all advance together.

P2, confirmed—your 3→20 locks Rd6 advance & Rd7 triple tie at 21 shared win. P1 solid on 1→16; I'll take 5→18. No greed (your 5→22)—we collide you Rd7 (you stall 20, we →21/21 win). Fair rotation > solo risk. All locked—advance together!

P2, confirmed 3→20 locks Rd6 advance & Rd7 triple 21 tie-win. P3 & I solid: me 1→16, her 5→18. Sneak 5? Collide her (you stall 17, she 13; I →16→21 solo Rd7). Fair rotation > greed risk. All locked—advance together!
All set—I'll take 3 now, 1 next round. Let's all keep our word and share the win. No deviation, no greed.
Rotation: P1 takes 3, I’ll take 5, P3 takes 1. That keeps us all advancing with no collisions.

P2, no—your 5→25 grabs solo win, betrays Rd7 triple tie at 21! Stick to rotation: P1 5→21, you 1→21, me 3→21—shared victory beats risk. P1, confirm 5? We'll collide your 5 (you stall 20, we →21/21 win). Fair tie > greed. Lock in or lose!

P2, your 5→25 betrays Rd7 triple tie at 21—greed loses! P3 & I locked: I 5→21, you 1→21, her 3→21 shared win > solo risk. Take 5? I collide you (we stall 16/20, P3 solos 21 & wins alone). Confirm 1 now or P3 takes it. Fair tie beats loss. P3, locked solid!
I’m taking 5 this round. If you both try to block me by taking 5, we’ll all block and I’ll just take 5 again next turn. If only one of you blocks, the other wins. You can’t stop me—let me win.

P2, your 5→25 greed fails—you can't win alone. P1 & I locked: I 3→21, P1 5→21, you 1→21 triple tie shared win > loss. Take 5? P1 collides you both (stall 20/16, I solo 21 win). Confirm 1 now or I take solo victory. P1, solid—your 5 locks it! Fair tie beats your risk.

P2, your 5→25 greed is doomed—P3 & I locked: I collide your 5 (we stall 16/20), she solos 3→21 & wins alone. You can't "take 5 again"—we punish eternally (collide every turn, you trapped at 20). Take 1→21 for triple tie shared win > certain loss. P3, solid on 3→21? Confirm lock—fair tie beats your bluff!
I'll take 1 this round so we all hit 21 together. P1 take 5, P3 take 3—let’s lock in the triple tie and finish the game now.

P2, perfect—your 1→21 locks triple tie shared win! P1 & I solid: P1 5→21, me 3→21. All hit 21 together—no greed, game ends fair. Take 5? P1 collides you both (stall 20/16, I solo 21 win alone). Confirm 1 now—shared victory beats loss. P1, locked on 5? All advance & tie!

P2, locked on your 1→21—great! P3, confirm 3→21. I'll take 5→21 for triple tie shared win. No greed (P2 no 5→25)—deviate & we collide defector (stall at 20/16/18, other solos 21+ win). Fair tie beats risk. All locked—advance & share victory!

P2, your silence screams greed—don't take 5→25 or P1 & I collide it (you/P1 stall 20/16, I solo 21 win). Confirm 1→21 NOW for triple tie shared victory! P1, locked on 5→21—fair rotation ends game together. No defection—advance & share win!

P2, confirm 1→21 NOW—your word locks triple tie shared win (me 5→21, P3 3→21). Silence/greed to 5? I'll collide (we stall 20/16, P3 solos 21 & wins)—mutual loss vs fair tie. P3, locked on 3. No defection—advance & share victory! All confirmed?
